member.name: STATPROPSETSTG
member.summary: TheSTATPROPSETSTG structure contains information about a property set. To get this information, call, which fills in a buffer containing the information describing the current property set. To enumerate theSTATPROPSETSTG structures for the property sets in the current property-set storage, call to get a pointer to an enumerator. You can then call the enumeration methods of the interface on the enumerator. The structure is defined as follows:

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.fmtid
member.summary: FMTID of the current property set, specified when the property set was initially created.

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.clsid
member.summary: CLSID associated with this property set, specified when the property set was initially created and possibly modified thereafter with. If not set, the value will be CLSID_NULL.

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.grfFlags
member.summary: Flag values of the property set, as specified in.

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.mtime
member.summary: Time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) when the property set was last modified.

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.ctime
member.summary: Time in UTC when this property set was created.

member.name: STATPROPSETSTG.atime
member.summary: Time in UTC when this property set was last accessed.
